content: description the autumn belle sweater is the perfect staple to your wardrobe it s beginner friendly with simple shapes the x stitch row are the perfect minimalistic detail sizes include xs-5x this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a kit through lion brand 2 it comes with the pdf digital download + all the yarn needed to make the sweater you can even customize your color choices 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/autumn-belle-sweater-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/2k47y
